snippet: Marco Scutaro, who was barrel-rolled in the first trying to turn a double play, ripped a two-run single in a messy fourth inning to help the Giants beat the Cardinals in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S.
abstract: San Francisco Giants defeat St Louis Cardinals, 7-1, to tie National League Championship Series, 1-1.
lead_paragraph: Marco Scutaro, who was barrel-rolled in the first trying to turn a double play, ripped a two-run single in a messy fourth inning to help the Giants beat the Cardinals in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S.

headline.seo: Giants Beat the Cardinals in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S.
headline.main: Victory Is Giants’ Best Revenge After a Takeout Slide by the Cardinals
headline.print_headline: Victory Is Giants’ Best Revenge After a Takeout Slide by the Cardinals
